title: DFW Stencil
content:
This is my first font so i was just wondering if i'm heading in the right direction. it's inspired by the kind of stuff you see on warplanes and airbases etc. help me out.   
   
 ![DFW](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014213749im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1654.gif)
author: roasthorse

comments.content:
To be honest, it looks a bit too much like simply a white line through the font. Maybe work on the stencil appearance by altering the position of the breaks.   
   
Shape of the actual letters is okay. Capital G could be better, seems too heavy.
